success.line: This warmth... I had forgotten what it felt like. Thank you, Rehema. Maybe... maybe I can find peace after all.

failure.line: Oh... this isn't quite right. I suppose some things are beyond fixing.

success.line: It’s... soothing. Like a whisper from the past telling me it’s okay. Thank you, Rehema. Maybe now, I can move on.

failure.line: No... this isn’t right. The regret still lingers, heavier than ever. I am still lost.

success.line: Ah... it reminds me of something I used to love. Maybe I haven't faded as much as I thought.

failure.line: I don’t feel anything... just more emptiness. I guess some things are beyond repair.

success.line: I can see a flicker of light in the dark. Maybe I don’t have to be lost forever.

failure.line: The fog hasn’t lifted. Maybe it never will...

success.line: This taste... it reminds me of home. Maybe I’m not as alone as I thought.

failure.line: No... this isn’t it. I still feel so... disconnected.

success.line: For the first time in a long while, I feel... settled. Thank you.

failure.line: Still drifting... still waiting. Maybe I always will be.

success.line: This fire inside me... I had forgotten it. Perhaps I am still here after all.

failure.line: Nothing stirs. I remain a shadow. Just as before.

success.line: This feeling... I think I can finally rest. Thank you, Rehema.

failure.line: No... I am still weary. Sleep eludes me, as always.

success.line: This flavor soothes my restless spirit. For the first time in ages, I feel at peace. Thank you.

failure.line: This... this is not what I longed for. The emptiness remains. I will keep waiting... forever.

success.line: Hah! You matched my fury beat for beat. I... I feel lighter. Maybe your help isn't so useless after all.

failure.line: Pathetic! You can't keep up! Your so-called kindness is nothing but weakness!
